# Cloud Provider Credentials Test Fixture
# Contains FAKE placeholder credentials for testing detection patterns
# All values use FAKEFAKE/00000 patterns to avoid triggering secret scanners

# ===== Azure Credentials =====
# Azure Storage Account Key
DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=fakestorageaccount;AccountKey=FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFA==

# Azure Connection String (full format)
azure_storage_connection = "DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=fakeaccount;AccountKey=FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFA=="

# Azure SAS Token
?sv=2021-06-08&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupiytfx&se=2024-12-31T23:59:59Z&st=2024-01-01T00:00:00Z&spr=https&sig=FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAK%3D

# Azure AD Client Secret
azure_client_secret = "FAKEFAKE~FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAK"
aad_client_secret: "FAKE~FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAK"

# Azure Subscription Key
ocp-apim-subscription-key = "00000000000000000000000000000000"
azure_subscription_key: "00000000000000000000000000000000"

# ===== GCP Credentials =====
# GCP Service Account Key (JSON structure)
{
  "type": "service_account",
  "project_id": "fake-test-project",
  "private_key_id": "0000000000000000",
  "private_key": "-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\nFAKEKEYFAKEKEYFAKEKEYFAKEKEY...\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\n",
  "client_email": "fake-sa@fake-test-project.iam.gserviceaccount.com"
}

# GCP API Key (same format as Google API Key)
gcp_api_key = "AIzaSyFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEF"

# GCP OAuth Client Secret
{
  "client_secret": "GOCSPX-FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE"
}

# ===== AWS Cloud Credentials =====
# AWS Session Token
aws_session_token = "FwoGZXIvYXdzEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE"

# AWS ARN
resource_arn = "arn:aws:s3:::fake-bucket/fake-key"
lambda_arn = "arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:000000000000:function:fake-function"
iam_role = "arn:aws:iam::000000000000:role/fake-role"

# AWS MWS Key
mws_auth_token = "amzn.mws.00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"

# ===== Firebase Credentials =====
# Firebase Realtime Database URL
firebase_url = "https://fake-test-project.firebaseio.com"
database_url = "https://fake-project-00000.firebaseio.com"

# Firebase API Key
firebase_api_key = "AIzaSyFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEF"

# Firebase Config Object
const firebaseConfig = {
  apiKey: "AIzaSyFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEF",
  authDomain: "fake-project.firebaseapp.com",
  databaseURL: "https://fake-project.firebaseio.com"
};

# ===== Cloudflare Credentials =====
# Cloudflare API Key
cloudflare_api_key = "0000000000000000000000000000000000000"
CLOUDFLARE_KEY=0000000000000000000000000000000000000

# Cloudflare API Token
cloudflare_api_token = "FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE"

# Cloudflare Origin CA Key
cf_origin_ca = "v1.0-000000000000000000000000-FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFA"

# Alibaba Access Key ID
alibaba_access_key = "LTAIFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE"

# Alibaba Secret Key
alibaba_secret_key = "FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAK"

# ===== IBM Cloud Credentials =====
# IBM Cloud API Key
ibm_cloud_api_key = "FAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKEFAKE0000"

# IBM COS HMAC Key
cos_hmac_access_key_id = "00000000000000000000000000000000"
ibm_cos_hmac_key: "00000000000000000000000000000000"

# ===== Oracle Cloud Credentials =====
# Oracle Cloud OCID
user_ocid = "ocid1.user.oc1..fakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefake"
tenancy = "ocid1.tenancy.oc1..fakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefakefake"

# Oracle API Key

# Oracle Tenancy OCID
